thread.title: Afghanistan 'artlords' use paintings for social change

title: Afghanistan 'artlords' use paintings for social change
text:
Afghanistan 'artlords' use paintings for social change 10:41am EST - 00:45 
Activists in Afghanistan's capital are painting murals on concrete blast walls as a tool for social change. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
